text: @KDscribe @narendramodi @AmitShah @himantabiswa @Pijush_hazarika No Govt.on earth can boast of defeating a pandemic like Covid19 which does not still  have a vaccine.What was the total no.of Covid cases in India when lockdown was hurriedly imposed on March 24th with just 4 hr.notice.After70 days,  Covid19case is about 2,20,000?Why so?.Failed?
